activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11381
activity.text:
Hello @nihal467 ,
I'm Vihanga Muthumala and I would like to be assigned to this issue. Below is my proposed solution.


**_Solution:_**

**1. Make Password Fields Optional:**
I will update the schema in `src/components/Users/UserForm.tsx` so that the password and `c_password` fields are not required.

**2. Conditional Confirm Password Validation:**
I will change the `.refine()` check in the schema so that the `c_password` field is required only when a password is entered.

**3. Update UI Indicators:**
I will update the form labels and validation messages in both `src/components/Users/UserForm.tsx` and `src/components/Users/UserFormValidations.tsx` to show that the password fields are optional.

Other than this changes I can update the test files to make sure everything works with new changes. I will also test manually to check that the fix works with the backend changes.


End date by _March 22, 2025._
